About Hadley Gayles

Hadley Gayles
Sr. Vice President/ General Manager
480-718-6124
hadley.gayles@govig.com

Hadley Gayles is the Senior Vice President, General Manager of Govig Healthcare. Govig is a retained search firm that works nationwide, their expertise include; broad executive search with a focus on clinical, operations, sales & marketing, and human resources.

Hadley possesses ten years of team leadership and customer relations management experience. Hadley began his career at Govig in June of 2008. Since that time he has been involved in 250+ successful placements, which include several C-level, VP and Regional retained searches. Hadley and his wife Jolie have a passion for traveling and spending time with their golden retriever Henry.

About Molly Ryan

Molly Ryan
Executive Recruiter
480-718-6136
molly.ryan@govig.com

Molly Ryan Coe specializes in the retained search for healthcare professionals nationwide, starting with property/mid-level management positions up through Corporate, Regional, Vice President and C-Suite level roles. Her disciplines include sales, operations, clinical, finance, human resources and administrative. Molly started recruiting in 2005 after receiving her Bachelorâs Degree in Organizational Psychology from The University of Arizona.

She joined Govig in 2008 where she has earned Presidentâs Club honors for the past 7 years. She is dedicated to the industry and looks to develop long-term relationships and effective partnerships with both her candidates and clients. Mollyâs spare time consists of family (husband, Ryan, and daughter, Ellie), her cocker spaniels, anything Ohio and the Arizona Wildcats.

About Collin Kalmansohn

Collin Kalmansohn
Executive Recruiter
480-718-6177
colin.kalmansohn@govig.com

Collin is a Client Account Manager working nationwide in Senior Housing to place mid to upper-level management positions with a focus on operations, sales, and clinical roles.

Collin began his career at Govig in August of 2014 and has been involved in 160+ successful placements since joining the team. Outside of work, he enjoys sports and daydreaming about what he will eat for his next meal.

About Ryan Joseph

Ryan Joseph
Executive Recruiter
480-718-6120
ryan.joseph@govig.com

Ryan Joseph is an Executive Recruiter/Client Account Manager on the Govig Healthcare team. Govig is a retained search firm that works nationwide, their areas of expertise include; broad executive search with a focus on clinical, operations, sales & marketing, and human resources.

Ryan has been with Govig since 2012, after graduating from Arizona State University with degrees in Marketing and Biology. Since that time, Ryan has been involved in the placement of 120+ professionals in the senior living space, including C-level and VP level retained searches. In his free time, Ryan enjoys traveling the world, having visited 33 countries so far with the goal of eventually visiting them all.

About Jim Capelle

Jim Capelle
Executive Recruiter / Business Developer
480-718-6169
Jim.capelle@govig.com

Jim Capelle is a Business Developer and Search Consultant working nationwide across healthcare. Primary emphasis is client development across senior care with a focus on sales, operations and clinical roles. Jim began his career with Govig in April of 2016 and has been involved in 70+ successful placements from the facility level thru the C-Suite. In 2017, Jim was a Presidentâs Club award recipient.

Away from the office, Jim enjoys spending time with his wife Brianna and their three children, Madeline, Jack and Maxwell. He is an avid golfer and passionate sports fan of all teams from his home state of Wisconsin.
